translations: 小型立式钢琴；古时的小型竖琴

sentences.sentence: But the spinet was too big for me to play.
sentences.translation: 但是钢琴太大了不适合我弹。

sentences.sentence: His nails resemble the ivory keys of the spinet.
sentences.translation: 他的指甲象白色的琴键一样。

sentences.sentence: One afternoon, when I was better, I played the spinet.
sentences.translation: 有天下午，我好了一点时，便弹奏钢琴。
